item.title: 美国 9 月成屋销售升至七个月新高
item.description: 美国 9 月份成屋销售增长至 7 个月来的新高，但经济不确定性的上升和劳动力市场的停滞可能会限制抵押贷款利率放松带来的提振作用。【原文：U.S. existing home sales increased to a seven-month high in September, but rising economic uncertainty and a stalled labor market could limit the boost from easing mortgage rates.】

item.title: WPP 裁员，帮助品牌利用人工智能制作自己的广告
item.description: 英国广告集团 WPP 周四表示，将允许品牌商访问其人工智能营销平台，以规划、创建和发布自己的营销活动。【原文：British ad group WPP said on Thursday it was letting brands access its AI-powered marketing platform to plan, create and publish their own campaigns.】

item.title: 研究公司称，如果药物定价与基准挂钩，美国本可节省 15 亿美元成本
item.description: 周四，一家颇具影响力的药品定价监督机构的分析显示，如果药品在扣除回扣和折扣后的价格与其基准一致，那么在药品获得批准后的第一年，美国本可以节省多达 15 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. could have saved up to $1.5 billion in the first year following approval of a drug if the price after rebates and discounts aligned with its benchmark, an analysis from an influential drug pricing watchdog showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普将阿根廷牛肉关税配额提高四倍至 8 万吨
item.description: 一位白宫官员周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府正在将阿根廷牛肉的关税配额翻两番，达到8万吨，以降低价格并保护美国农民。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is quadrupling the tariff rate quota on Argentinian beef to 80,000 metric tons to reduce prices and protect American farmers, a White House official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 超微公司下调第一季度收入预期
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周四下调了第一季度营收预期，理由是大型人工智能交易的客户交付时间表发生了变化。【原文：Super Micro Computer trimmed its first-quarter revenue forecast on Thursday, citing a shift in customer delivery schedules for large artificial intelligence deals.】

item.title: Grubhub 和自动驾驶初创公司 Avride 在泽西市启动机器人送餐试点项目
item.description: Grubhub与自动驾驶技术初创公司Avride周四表示，双方将扩大合作，在新泽西州泽西城试点机器人送餐服务。【原文：Grubhub is expanding its partnership with self-driving technology startup Avride to pilot robot food deliveries in Jersey City, New Jersey, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 耐克研发电动运动鞋，力图重获创新优势
item.description: 耐克公司周四表示，该公司正在研发一种电动鞋类系统，以帮助休闲运动员和行动不便的人更快地移动，这是该公司最新发布的四款新产品之一，旨在向世界展示该公司仍处于体育科技的最前沿。【原文：Nike on Thursday said it is working on a motorized footwear system to help casual athletes and mobility-impaired people move faster, one of four new products it teased in its latest effort to show the world it is still on the cutting-edge of sports technology.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道：电动汽车回潮，Rivian 将裁员 600 多人
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 将裁员 600 多人。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Rivian Automotive is set to lay off more than 600 people, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受人工智能基础设施需求影响，多佛尔上调 2025 年利润展望
item.description: 工业设备制造商多福（Dover）周四上调了全年调整后利润预期，押注尽管关税存在不确定性，但对其工业设备的需求仍将保持弹性，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 2.5%。【原文：Industrial equipment maker Dover raised its full-year adjusted profit forecast on Thursday, betting on resilient demand for its industrial equipment despite tariff uncertainty, sending its shares up 2.5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: HFR 表示，对冲基金目前管理着近 5 万亿美元的资金记录
item.description: 对冲基金研究公司（HFR）周四发布的一份报告显示，第三季度全球对冲基金资本增至创纪录的近 5 万亿美元，对冲基金数量达到十年来的峰值，反映出大量新资金涌入该行业。【原文：Global hedge fund capital rose to a record of almost $5 trillion in the third quarter and the number of hedge funds is at a decade peak, reflecting an influx of new money into the sector, a report by Hedge Fund Research (HFR) showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于收购成本的影响，罗珀下调了年度利润预期
item.description: 软件公司罗珀科技（Roper Technologies）周四下调了年度利润预期，因为该公司预计第三季度与收购相关的成本将增加。【原文：Software company Roper Technologies cut its annual profit forecast on Thursday, as it expects higher costs related to acquisitions in the third quarter.】

item.title: Lumen与Palantir联手加速企业采用人工智能
item.description: 电信公司Lumen Technologies和数据分析公司Palantir Technologies周四宣布建立多年合作关系，旨在帮助企业更快、更安全地部署人工智能。【原文：Telecommunications firm Lumen Technologies and data analytics firm Palantir Technologies announced a multi-year partnership on Thursday, aiming to help businesses deploy artificial intelligence more quickly and securely.】

item.title: 季度初财报显示企业正在适应特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 周四，一些全球最大的食品、消费品和汽车生产商公布了强于预期的季度业绩，缓解了投资者对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收进口关税的担忧。【原文：Some of the world's biggest producers of food, consumer goods and cars delivered stronger-than-expected quarterly results on Thursday, easing investor concerns over the toll of U.S. President Donald Trump's import tariffs.】

item.title: 处于战争状态的俄罗斯面临双重麻烦：特朗普的最后通牒和对印度石油销售的打击
item.description: 世界第二大石油出口国俄罗斯正在权衡如何应对美国对顶级石油公司俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil）的制裁，以及对其最大买家印度的销售额下降的前景。【原文：Russia, the world's second largest oil exporter, is weighing how to respond to U.S. sanctions on top oil firms Rosneft and Lukoil and the prospect of lower sales to its biggest buyer, India.】

item.title: 铜价上涨缓解产量下降，自由港麦克莫兰公司利润增长
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan）周四公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，原因是铜价上涨有助于抵消印尼 Grasberg 矿暂停运营后产量的下降。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan surpassed Wall Street estimate for third-quarter profit on Thursday, as higher copper prices helped counter lower production after operations were suspended at its Grasberg mine in Indonesia.】

item.title: CenterPoint 盈利超预期，得益于工业用电需求和监管恢复
item.description: 美国公用事业公司 CenterPoint Energy 周四公布的第三季度利润高于预期，主要原因是监管法规的恢复和工业需求的增长，包括德克萨斯州休斯敦新的人工智能数据中心负荷。【原文：U.S. utility CenterPoint Energy on Thursday posted a higher-than-expected third-quarter profit, driven by regulatory recovery and rising industrial demand, including new AI data center loads in Houston, Texas.】

item.title: Grab 投资 May Mobility，机器人出租车初创公司进军东南亚市场
item.description: May Mobility 周四表示，它已获得新加坡打车公司 Grab 的大笔股权投资，这是这家机器人出租车初创公司明年在东南亚扩张的举措之一。【原文：May Mobility said on Thursday it has secured a significant equity investment from Singapore-based ridehailing firm Grab , as part of the robotaxi startup's move to expand in Southeast Asia next year.】

item.title: 谷歌支持美国中西部数据中心采用碳捕集技术的天然气发电厂
item.description: 谷歌（Google）科技公司周四表示，该公司已经签署了第一份从美国一家使用碳捕集与封存技术的发电厂购买电力的协议，以帮助为其位于美国中西部地区的数据中心提供燃料。【原文：Google has entered into the first corporate agreement to buy electricity from a U.S. power plant using carbon capture and storage in a deal to help fuel its data centers in the country's Midwest region, the technology company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 电池回收公司 Redwood 获 Eclipse Ventures 和 Nvidia 3.5 亿美元投资
item.description: 电池回收公司Redwood Materials周四表示，该公司已经完成了一轮3.5亿美元的融资，由风险投资公司Eclipse Ventures领投，包括英伟达（Nvidia）投资部门NVentures在内的新投资者也参与了本轮融资。【原文：Battery recycling firm Redwood Materials said on Thursday it has closed a $350 million funding round led by venture capital firm Eclipse Ventures, with participation from new investors including Nvidia's investment arm, NVentures.】

item.title: 石油期货回归结构性，表明俄罗斯制裁导致供应紧张
item.description: 在美国对俄罗斯的新制裁再次引发对近期市场供应紧张的担忧之后，即期布伦特原油期货合约周四恢复了对六个月合约的溢价交易，消除了此前担心供应过剩的迹象。【原文：The prompt Brent crude futures contract on Thursday returned to trading at a premium to the six-month contract after new U.S. sanctions on Russia revived concern of a tight market in the near term, erasing earlier signs of a fear of a glut.】

item.title: T-Mobile 上调年度预期，因 iPhone 升级导致用户增长超过预期
item.description: T-Mobile 周四表示，第三季度新增了 100 万按月付费的无线用户，这一数字也超过了预期，并上调了全年业绩预期。【原文：T-Mobile said on Thursday it added 1 million wireless subscribers who pay a monthly bill in the third quarter that also topped estimates and raised its annual forecast, powered by iPhone upgrades and premium plans that drew users from rivals.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯生产商的制裁推动中国和印度的需求，现货原油溢价跳涨
item.description: 贸易消息人士和分析师称，原油市场现货溢价周四跳涨，原因是预计美国对俄罗斯主要产油国的制裁将刺激中国和印度对中东、非洲和南美供应的需求。【原文：Spot premiums in crude markets jumped on Thursday on expectations that U.S. sanctions on top Russian producers will spur China and India's demand for supplies from the Middle East, Africa and South America, trade sources and analysts said.】

item.title: 联合太平洋铁路公司季度利润增长
item.description: 联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）周四公布的第三季度利润增长了 9%，主要得益于强劲的定价能力。【原文：Union Pacific reported a 9% rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, powered by strong pricing.】

item.title: 联合利华首席执行官称美国政府停摆未影响消费者情绪
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）消费品公司首席执行官周四表示，迄今为止，政府关门并未对其主要美国市场的消费者情绪产生重大影响。【原文：Unilever has not seen a significant impact on consumer sentiment so far from the government shutdown in its key U.S. market, the CEO of the consumer goods company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为到 2026 年底黄金平均价格将达到 5,055 美元/盎司
item.description: 摩根大通（JP Morgan）周四预测，根据明年投资者需求和央行平均每季度买入约566吨的假设，到2026年第四季度，金价可能达到平均5055美元/盎司。【原文：JP Morgan on Thursday forecast gold prices could reach an average of $5,055/oz by the fourth quarter of 2026, based on assumptions that investor demand and central bank buying will average around 566 tonnes per quarter next year.】

item.title: Mobileye 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 周四，Mobileye Global 第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是汽车制造商急于采用自动驾驶软件，增加了对该公司驾驶辅助芯片的订单。【原文：Mobileye Global beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Thursday, as automakers ramped up orders of the company's driver-assisted chips in a rush to adopt autonomous software.】

item.title: 美国航空公司上调 2025 年利润展望，原因是高端需求强劲，定价收益增加
item.description: 美国航空公司周四上调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是对高利润高端服务的强劲需求以及国内航线定价能力的提高。【原文：American Airlines raised its 2025 profit forecast on Thursday, supported by robust demand for high-margin premium services and an improvement in pricing power on domestic routes.】

item.title: Blackstone 季度利润大增 48%，私募股权投资及信贷业务表现强劲
item.description: 全球最大的另类资产管理公司 Blackstone 周四公布，受信贷和私募股权投资业务强劲增长的推动，第三季度利润增长 48%。【原文：Blackstone , the world's largest alternative asset manager, reported a 48% rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by strong gains in its credit and private equity businesses.】

item.title: 拉扎德第三季度利润因交易复苏而上升
item.description: 随着交易活动的加快，拉扎德第三季度的利润有所增长，这与华尔街大型竞争对手的增长情况如出一辙。【原文：Lazard's profit rose in the third quarter as dealmaking activity picked up pace, mirroring gains at larger Wall Street rivals.】

item.title: 美国石油跳涨，特斯拉下滑
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】
